page.title: 03ENERGY
page.content:
Kineton had its own gas works, now a private house, until c1940, following the development of{electricity}supply (first introduced in 1930) the need gradually disappeared. There is no connection to the national gas supply. The electricity supply is now the responsibility of the E.M.E.B. A survey of 30 homes revealed the following percentages of energy sources for Heating & Cooking:_ 30 Homes. Heating Cooking Electricity 23% 47% Gas 26% 22% Solid Fuel 38% 31% Oil 13% _
{Water}is the responsibility of the Severn Trent Water Authority and is piped from a bore hole Nr. Wasperton via the resevoir on Pittern Hill.
